MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G67 postcode area of Cumbernauld. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at midday due to an underground cable fault on Blairlinn Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:35pm on Saturday, 24 October 2020
